bug.name: Paul Boddie
bug.comment: This is just one example, since everywhere a PDF is offered there's a link to download Acrobat Reader - Original link broken. Link updated on 2015-04-29 by Nicola Feltrin

bug.name: Paul Boddie
bug.comment: Although this page is perhaps aimed at university users, it's striking that the page is about open formats and yet they deem it necessary only to advertise Acrobat Reader as a reader. (And yes, since I use the only supported flavour of GNU/Linux at UiO, I know it wouldn't hurt to mention the programs that are actually installed on such platforms and to mention alternatives for other platforms.) - Original link broken. Link updated on 2015-04-29 by Nicola Feltrin
